description: This script sets up a PostgreSQL database instance, initializes it if necessary, configures user permissions, applies schema and seed data if present, and saves connection details. It automates the database startup and setup process for a specific application, ensuring the database environment is ready for use.

methods.name: ls
methods.description: Lists directory contents to find PostgreSQL version.

methods.name: pg_isready
methods.description: Checks if PostgreSQL server is accepting connections on specified port.

methods.name: pgrep
methods.description: Finds running PostgreSQL processes matching criteria.

methods.name: initdb
methods.description: Initializes a new PostgreSQL data directory if it doesn't exist.

methods.name: psql
methods.description: Connects to PostgreSQL for executing SQL commands or scripts.
